name: fs25-limit-husbandry-animals
description: Limit the number of animals in animal pens
author: Ritter

scripts.validate: MD=${PWD} && cd ../../FS25_mods_build_helper && poetry run modbuild validate ${MD}
scripts.package: MD=${PWD} && cd ../../FS25_mods_build_helper && poetry run modbuild package ${MD}
scripts.deploy: MD=${PWD} && cd ../../FS25_mods_build_helper && poetry run modbuild deploy ${MD}
scripts.clean: MD=${PWD} && cd ../../FS25_mods_build_helper && poetry run modbuild clean ${MD}
scripts.release: MD=${PWD} && cd ../../FS25_mods_build_helper && poetry run modbuild build ${MD}
